verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> all you nations! <S%H1471><s%> Extol <S%H1984><s%> him, <S%H1471><s%> all you peoples!
For his loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1396><s%> toward us. <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh's faithfulness <S%H571><s%> endures forever. <S%H5769><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3068><s%>
